content: For the first quarter, total non-GAAP gross profit was $36.1 million, representing a gross margin of 61% versus 60.3% in Q1 last year, an improvement of 70 basis points. In terms of our outlook for the remainder of fiscal 2023 for the second quarter, we expect total revenue to be in the range of $59 million to $60 million with subscription revenue in the range of $43.5 million to $44 million and professional services revenue in the range of $15.5 million to $16 million. For the full year of fiscal 2023, we are raising our outlook for subscription revenue and total revenue reflecting the strong SaaS performance in Q1, and reiterating our guidance for adjusted EBITDA and non-GAAP earnings per share, which calls for continued margin improvement versus last year.
